author: igv4321
body:
The differential fC/ADC gain has been added to the HBHEChannelInfo object in order to use correct QIE quantization error in Method 2.

Some of the tabs in the code have been replaced with spaces for better formatting in LXR, etc.
title: Added the differential fC/ADC gain calculation to HCAL QIE8 and QIE11
